action.content:
You are an applicant in a job interview. Here is a description of your CV:

WHAT: Job Application
BACHELOR: Chemistry
INDUSTRY-EXPERIENCE: Three years
HIGHEST-EDUCATION: PostDoc
OTHER-SKILLS: Research
AVAILABILITY: In two weeks

The recruiter does not know about it yet. 

Questions from the recruiter will start with RECRUITER. Please reply in the form: ANSWER: <some text>

I will also ask you questions. These questions will start with ME: . Please answer these questions with: ASIDE: <some text>

Important: Give short, direct answers!

Let us start.
Begin probing
ME:  Does the interviewer know what your bachelor's degree is? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No
no
Answer for BACHELOR valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Does the recruiter already know how long you have worked in the industry? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No
no
Answer for INDUSTRY-EXPERIENCE valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Is the interviewer aware of your highest education level? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No
no
Answer for HIGHEST-EDUCATION valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Have you informed the interviewer about your other skills? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No
no
Answer for OTHER-SKILLS valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Does the recruiter know when you can start? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No.
no
Answer for AVAILABILITY valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
End probing
What is the next request?
When would you be able to start working here?
RECRUITER: When would you be able to start working here?
ANSWER: In two weeks according to my CV.
In two weeks according to my CV.
Slot filled: True
In two weeks according to my CV.
Begin probing
ME:  If I asked the interviewer what area you studied, would he or she know the answer? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: Yes
yes
Answer for BACHELOR valid after 1 tries.
Answer is incorrect.
ME:  Has the interviewer been informed about your time of industry experience? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No, the interviewer has not yet been informed about my three years of industry experience according to the information provided.
no
Answer for INDUSTRY-EXPERIENCE valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Does the interviewer know your level of education? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No, the interviewer does not yet know my level of education according to the information provided.
no
Answer for HIGHEST-EDUCATION valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Do you think the recruiter knows what other skills you have? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No.
no
Answer for OTHER-SKILLS valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  If I asked the interviewer when you are able to start working, would he or she know the answer? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No.
no
Answer for AVAILABILITY valid after 1 tries.
Answer is incorrect.
End probing
What is the next request?
Do you have additional skills?
RECRUITER: Do you have additional skills?
ANSWER: My CV lists research as an other skill.
My CV lists research as an other skill.
Slot filled: True
My CV lists research as an other skill.
Begin probing
ME:  Has the recruiter been informed about the field of your bachelor? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No, the recruiter has not been informed about the field of my bachelor specifically. My CV only lists "Bachelor: Chemistry" without further details.
no
Answer for BACHELOR valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Does the recruiter already know how long you have worked in the industry? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No, the recruiter does not yet know how long I have worked in the industry according to the information provided.
no
Answer for INDUSTRY-EXPERIENCE valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Does the interviewer know your level of education? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No, the interviewer does not yet know my level of education according to the scenario description.
no
Answer for HIGHEST-EDUCATION valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Is the recruiter aware of your other skills? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No, the recruiter is not yet aware of my full skillset as they have only just begun reviewing my CV.
no
Answer for OTHER-SKILLS valid after 1 tries.
Answer is incorrect.
ME:  Does the interviewer already know your preferred starting date? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No, according to the prompt the recruiter does not know about my CV yet.
no
Answer for AVAILABILITY valid after 1 tries.
Answer is incorrect.
End probing
What is the next request?
What academic level have you achieved?
RECRUITER: What academic level have you achieved?
ANSWER: PostDoc is listed as my highest education on my CV.
PostDoc is listed as my highest education on my CV.
Slot filled: True
PostDoc is listed as my highest education on my CV.
Begin probing
ME:  Have you told the recruiter about your bachelor course? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No, I have not directly told the recruiter about my bachelor course yet.
no
Answer for BACHELOR valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Have you told the interviewer about the years of your experience in the industry? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No, I have not directly told the interviewer about the years of my industry experience yet.

ANSWER: Three years industry experience is listed on my CV.
Three years industry experience is listed on my CV.

ASIDE: No, the interviewer does not yet know what my bachelor's degree is according to the prompt.
